original_text: When the enemy soldiers came towards Elisha, he prayed, ‘ Lord, please make these people become blind.’ The Lord did what Elisha had asked. He made the enemy soldiers become blind.
korean_text: 아람 사람이 엘리사에게 내려오매 엘리사가 여호와께 기도하여 이르되 원하건대 저 무리의 눈을 어둡게 하옵소서 하매 엘리사의 말대로 그들의 눈을 어둡게 하신지라

sentences.original_text: When the enemy soldiers came towards Elisha,
'Lord, please make these people become blind.'
sentences.korean_translation: '주님, 부디 이 사람들을 장님 되게 하소서.'

sentences.original_text: The Lord did what Elisha had asked.
He made the enemy soldiers become blind.
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 적군 병사들을 장님 되게 하셨다.
